Going out tonight?

1. Search for bars & clubs venues
* app uses yelp.com api
2. Tap going button, then...
* tap going button again to remove your twitter username from the RSVP list
3. It'll add your twitter name to the RSVP list
* dont worry your RSVP will expire by the next day
